articles.author: NBA.com Staff
articles.title: Starting 5: Pacers win on road (again), All-NBA teams unveiled & West Finals Game 3 tonight - NBA
articles.description: Indiana takes a 2-0 lead at Madison Square Garden, All-NBA teams announced and West Finals continue tonight in Minnesota.
articles.content:
Playoff wins on the road hit different.
Pascal Siakam and the Pacers now have six of them in a row.
5 STORIES IN TODAY’S EDITION 
May 24, 2025
Pacers Up 2-0: Siakam shines as Indy takes first two… [+13768 chars]
